description: A playful encounter between two nuts.
title: Nutty Chase
n_1: Almond spots Cashew and decides to initiate a playful chase.
c1_1: Hey, where do you think you're going?
c2_1: Try and catch me if you can!
n_2: The chase intensifies, with Cashew leading Almond on a merry dance.
c2_2: You'll have to be quicker than that!
n_3: As they round a corner, Cashew looks back with a cheeky grin.
n_4: Almond can't help but laugh at the pun, ending the chase on a light note.
